{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=9108}} [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/us.robotics/usr9108 On the OpenWrt wiki] :Multiple revisions (A and B)? Per WiGLE, the default SSID is '''USR9108''' (approx. 2000 entries with 00:14:C1 OUI).
